Gumdrop

Uses of Package
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jndi

  • Packages that use org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jndi 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet
    Servlet 4.0 container implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jndi
    JNDI resource management for the Gumdrop servlet container.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jndi used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet 
    Class Description
    Resource
    Definition of a resource that will be instantiated and bound in the JNDI context for the web application.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jndi used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jndi 
    Class Description
    BasicJCAConnection
    Basic implementation of a JCA-style Connection for Gumdrop servlet container.
    BasicJCAConnectionFactory
    Basic implementation of a JCA-style ConnectionFactory for Gumdrop servlet container.
    ConnectionFactory
    A JCA connection factory.
    Injectable
    A reference to a JNDI resource in a web application that potentially contains an injection target.
    InjectionTarget
    An injection target for the value of a JNDI resource.
    JmsConnectionFactory.Pool
    Connection pool configuration for a JMS connection factory.
    JndiContext
    Interface for servlet context JNDI operations.
    Resource
    Definition of a resource that will be instantiated and bound in the JNDI context for the web application.
